text: The time to overall clinical stabilization from admission was significantly longer in the Adv group patients than in the Non - Adv group patients ( 4 . 3 ± 2 . 8 d vs . 2 . 9 ± 1 . 8 d , P = 0 . 034 ) . In addition , the length of hospital was not significantly different between the two groups , and no patient died in our study .
